DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to validate a visual method of presenting nutritional information by determining if users of the visual method remember food properties better than users given the same information in a non-visual form with texts and tables.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a Visual Nutrient Profiling System on Recall of Nutrition Information
DOC.criteria: Current student at University of Illinois at UrbanaChampaign
